By Natalie Gagliordi for Between the Lines | February 11, 2021 -- 15:15 GMT (07:15 PST) | Topic: Digital Transformation Bed Bath & Beyond's tech stack now includes two bitter rivals after the home goods retailer announced Thursday that it's signed a deal with Oracle to use its enterprise resource planning (ERP) technology."
